title: LineageOS 18.1 adds support for the Xiaomi Mi 10T/Mi 10i 5G, Moto G100, and Galaxy Tab S6 Lite
content:
The LineageOS team is working hard on LineageOS 19.0, the next major revision of the popular custom ROM based on Android 12. While we don’t know when the new version will be officially landing, the team continues to extend LineageOS 18.1 support to more and more devices. After releasing LineageOS 18.1 for the OnePlus 9,

The post LineageOS 18.1 adds support for the Xiaomi Mi 10T/Mi 10i 5G, Moto G100, and Galaxy Tab S6 Lite appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Official builds of LineageOS 18.1 are now available for the Motorola Moto G100, Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite, and Mi 10T Lite / Mi 10i 5G.
